typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		customer_id as string,
		salutation as string,
		first_name as string,
		last_name as string,
		dob as date,
		birth_country as string,
		email_address as string,
		phone_number as string,
		phone_number_type as string,
		address_id as string,
		country as string,
		county as string,
		state as string,
		city as string,
		street_number as string,
		street_name as string,
		zip as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> CustomerInfo
CustomerInfo select(mapColumn(
		customer_id
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectTransformation
SelectTransformation derive(HK_CUSTOMER_ID = md5(customer_id),
		REC_SRC = "Customer_Info",
		Datetime = currentDate(),
		Cust_Id = customer_id) ~> DataConversion
DataConversion sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		CUSTOMER_ID = Cust_Id,
		HK_CUSTOMER_ID,
		REC_SRC,
		LOAD_DTS = Datetime
	)) ~> HubCustomer
